item.description:
So I decided that this will be the year of health, wealth and VIGOR.... so to that end we will be hosting (and I'm looking for some creative ideas and help) a series of events that will help all of us become healthier more vibrant human beings.

Some will have to do with diet, some with exercise of all kinds, some dealing with mental and spiritual growth (I really need help with that one)

I'll be making these up as I go along so I'm serious - I want your help.

I know it's short notice but I want to try to do cooking classes at least twice per month. The first one is on Salads. We all need more raw vegetables and I get sick of the same old combinations. So I'm looking for some of your ideas and creativity.

Next Monday night I will choose at least 3 salads for our group to sample. And those salads will come from you my fellow members. I will make my favorite. If you have a specialty please let me know.  No worries if you don't have one. Your only requirement to attend is the desire and will to create a healthier lifestyle. In addition to salad ingredients if anyone has any great Salad dressing recipes - please bring them along with the ingredients.

If you bring a recipe please email it to me so I can print copies for the guests. Bring a 3 ring binder and you can start your own cookbook.

Please no store bought salads or dressings. Organic if possible. I know that's not in everyones budget but it would be good to share ideas and recipes.
item.how_to_find_us: I will email address to attendees

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Vigor - Salad Night at my house
